name: IronCube Trio
description:
IronCube Trio is a sequel to IronDot Trio Black. This time, it features a fasty and smarty CUBE instead, with brand new adventures of course!

IronCube Trio provides a unique opportunity to challenge and prove yourself very similar to IronMan triathlon but in a mental and gaming way!

It features 3 very tough games as continuous stages but all with great fun: Courage, Focus and Perseverance! Come and challenge yourself now at our eSports platform to earn the life-long bragging rights of being tough and strong!
